name: LFBR.SwiftLib
summary: Commons extensions and complements written in swift to be development easier
description:
This library have some usefull extension for
  路Dismiss keyboard easy 锔
  路Manage time like timestamp
  路Get size and type of your current devices
  路Some usual regex and his extension with strings
  路Some methods to create UIColors with RGB format
  路Some easy methods to encrypt your data
